name: ConfigExternalPriceSource
description:
This route facilitates setting up an external price source in Pricing Hub. It also allows you to activate or deactivate that source in a given account. 

>ℹ️ This feature is in closed beta, available only for selected customers. If you have any questions, contact our [Support](https://support.vtex.com/hc/en-us/requests).

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand

Content-Type.description: Describes the type of the content being sent

X-VTEX-API-AppKey.description: The AppKey configured by the merchant

X-VTEX-API-AppToken.description: The AppToken configured by the merchant
